amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to violate Public Law 105-264 relating to the use of Federal credit cards by Federal employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to violate Public Law 105-264.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
